name: will-finance-5.0
description: ðŸš€ Sistema de gerenciamento financeiro cyberpunk completo e multiplataforma com React + TypeScript + Vite frontend, NestJS backend, PostgreSQL, IA integrada, dockerizado e pronto para Electron/React Native.

scripts.preinstall: echo 'ðŸš€ Iniciando instalaÃ§Ã£o do Will Finance 5.0...'
scripts.dev:silent: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --success first "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" > /dev/null 2>&1
scripts.dev:local: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "DB,SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "blue,cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:db" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run docker:build
scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:quick: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:generate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:backup: docker exec will-finance-db pg_dump -U will_finance will_finance_db > ./database/backup/backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i will-finance-db psql -U will_finance -d will_finance_db
scripts.db:init: npm run db:setup && echo 'âœ… Banco de dados inicializado!'
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:watch" "cd server && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:coverage" "cd server && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:import
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run format:client && npm run format:server
scripts.docker:rebuild: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && docker volume prune -f
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd client && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd client && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm audit fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist
scripts.clean:cache: npm cache clean --force && cd client && npm cache clean --force && cd ../server && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:logs: rm -rf server/logs/* client/logs/* && mkdir -p server/logs client/logs
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:cache && npm run clean:docker && npm run clean:logs
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.reset:full: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ Setup completo! Execute npm run dev para iniciar'
scripts.version:bump: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
